actions.committee: House Committee on Science and Technology
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Science and Technology.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the use of expenditure of Federal funds for the conversion of weather information to the metric system without a direct authorization by the Congress.

summary.text: Prohibits the use or expenditure of Federal funds by the National Weather Service or any other Federal agency or department for the conversion of weather information or data to the metric system unless specifically authorized by Congress.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the use of expenditure of Federal funds for the conversion of weather information to the metric system without a direct authorization by the Congress.
